timeline.message: Tweaking product fields in module api
Adding dummy servlet for related modules
Adding dummy servlet for included assemblies

timeline.bodyText: I am wondering why do we set the url value to https://www.redhat.com?
timeline.author: xdavidson

replies.bodyText: I wanted it to be something that was easy to recognize as wrong. If we made it something realistic, someone might accidentally think that the related modules list was legitimate.
replies.author: benradey

timeline.bodyText: Would it make more sense to set the path to "/api/assemblies"?
timeline.author: xdavidson

replies.bodyText: Great question! I don't think so - because this api is "what assemblies use this module" - so it is still module-centric. We will have an "/api/assembly" api in the future, which will likely include "what modules are used by this assembly" - and that will be assembly-centric, justifying the url structure.
replies.author: benradey
